controlaccess.corpname: Virginia. -- Dept. of Conservation and Recreation

scopecontent.p: Regulatory case files, 1988-1997, of the Dept. of Conservation and Recreation. Regulatory case files document agency processes to establish regulations as part of the Virginia Administrative Code. Includes drafts, including marked drafts; economic impact statements; correspondence; memoranda; and any other materials related to the establishment of regulations. Includes case files for stormwater regulations, the Virginia Outdoors Foundation, nutrient management training and certification, dam safety, impounding structure regulations, erosion and sediment regulations, and flood prevention and protection fund regulations.
